me bhikshunta mese budu dahamata niga demin hasirennata thawath ida denawada nadda yanna dan mahanayaka himiwarun thiranaya kala yuthuwa atha. 2017 mayi masayedi burumaye ihalama sangha sabhawa enam sangha maha nayaka kamituwa wishesha niwedanayak karamin ashwin wirathu himiyan nayakathwaya hobawana mabatha sanwidhanaya danum dunne rata pura owun wisin pradarshanayata thaba athi puwaru iwath karana lesayi.

gota niyojanaya karana jathiwadi saha aagamwadi balawegayan prabala wuwada ema balawegayan niyojanaya sandaha ohuge yogya bawa pilibanda dadi wirodhayan ema kandawure samahara nayakanayan gen ella wi atha.emanisa gota ge yojana kramaya siduwiya hakkak bawa ta sahathika kala nohaka.eya ese wuwahoth gota genawith janathawata prajathanthrawadaye watinakama iganwime nirmalge sihinaya saba nowanu atha.meya prajathanthrawadi wyaparayata siduwana paduwak lesa ohu dakinnata puluewan kama aththe ee pilibandawa kalaka siti sahena bala poroththu sahitha kathikawak ohu goda naga athi bawini.

prajathanthrawadaya samanga pudgala nidahasa, madhya ha kathakirime nidahasa samanga aandi thibena manawa himikam da surakina rajyayak hatiyata amerikawa sesu ratawalata aadarshayak sapayiya yuthuya.eheth anekuth ratawala manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirima gana amerikawa mahath uwamanawakin katayuthu karana bawa pahadili weyi.â€lokaye poliskarayaâ€ lesa kriya karamin sesu ratawala abhyanthara katayuthuwalata athapowana amerikawa thama purawasiyan ge manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirime kriyawaliyaka niyali sitina andama da pahadiliya.amerikan purawasiyan ge pamanak nowa yuropaye ha anekuth ratawala rahas ekathu kirime kriyawaliyaka niyali sitina andama pasugiyada amerikanuwaku wisin helikirima erata rajayata wadunu kane paharak banduya.anunge dos sewime yedi siti amerikan rajayata ha ee sandaha udaw wana ef.bi.ayi, si.ayi.ee. wani rahas sanwidhanawala katayuthu heli kirima arambau daniyal elsbarg, juliyan asang wannawun anuwa yamin amerikanuwaku wana edwad snodan amerikan rajaye rahas oththu sewa pulul ayurin karanu labana manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirime kriyawaliyaka sulamula helikara atha.ema helidarawwa samanga amerikan janadhipathi warak obamata rata thulin menma antharjathika washayen da dawantha abhiyogayakata muhuna dimata siduwi atha.
